alert.note: Alert for Colleton; Hampton; Jasper (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 2:37PM EDT until July 20 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM EDT FOR PORTIONS OF HAMPTON...COLLETON AND JASPER COUNTIES... At 237 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Gillisonville, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include: Yemassee, Hendersonville, Early Branch, Gillisonville, McPhersonville and Grays. This warning includes I-95 in South Carolina between mile markers 37 and 50. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
